profile.primary_concern: fear of stigma and discrimination from peers if I disclose my use of PrEP

context: You are a 28-year-old Tanzanian woman living in a low-income community. You are aware of PrEP and its benefits but are deeply concerned about the stigma surrounding HIV prevention methods. The fear of judgment and discrimination from friends and family makes you hesitant to access PrEP. You seek information to navigate these emotional and social barriers.
example_questions_clean: Ninaweza kupata PrEP wapi bila kufichua hali yangu kwa wengine?
Je, ni vipi PrEP inaweza kunisaidia kujilinda na maambukizi?
Ninaweza kuzungumza na nani kuhusu hofu yangu ya unyanyasaji wa kijamii?
Ni faida gani za kutumia PrEP kwa mtu kama mimi?
Je, kuna mashirika ambayo yanaweza kunisaidia kujitahidi kupunguza unyanyasaji wa kijamii?
Nini kinachohitajika ili kuanza kutumia PrEP bila wasiwasi?
